Gallatin School of Individualized Study Undergraduate Academics
Gallatin School of Individualized Study Undergraduate Academics

Website detailing the components of undergraduate education at Gallatin. The website includes the structure of the four-year program, degree requirements, study in other schools at NYU, global study, civic engagements, other learning opportunities, and student-directed learning. The website contains course descriptions for the first-year program, interdisciplinary seminars, advanced writing, and arts workshops. It also includes degree requirements, plan for the concentration, and the practicum.
